summary: Through archival footage and dramatic readings of his personal writings, the life of Nazi Germany's Propaganda Minister, Josef Goebbels, is examined.
cast: Udo Samel|Kenneth Branagh|Heinrich Brüning|Winston Churchill|Engelbert Dollfuss|Wilhelm Frick|Joseph Goebbels|Magda Goebbels|Hermann Göring|Veit Harlan|Rudolf Hess|Heinrich Himmler|Adolf Hitler|Alfred Hugenberg|Joe Louis|Benito Mussolini|Augustine Alfred Joseph Paul-Boncour|Leni Riefenstahl|Theodore Roosevelt|Heinz Rühmann|Max Schmeling|Franz Seldte|John Allsebrook Simon|Franz von Epp|Paul von Hindenburg|Franz von Papen|Harry Giese
title: Das Goebbels-Experiment
